name: Bestseller
description:
As a writer facing the writer's block, you have only 30 days until the deadline. Do you think you can manage it?

In Bestseller you are an aspiring writer struggling to finish their book. Sip coffee and find inspiration to fight your way through the last month before deadline. Your publisher is expecting a lot! Don't let them down. The best literature is sometimes created by carefully treading the fine line between sanity and madness.

The game is made with LÖVE framework for the 46th Ludum Dare by me (Leo Jämsä) and my friend (Artturi Kivelä). Music was made by Jermu Itävuori.

The standalone executable is for 64-bit Windows. For other operating systems you'll need  LÖVE installed (https://love2d.org/) to run .love files.
